title: City Transport Simulator: Tram
description: Become a tram driver! Hop back into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![City Transport Simulator: Tram-6mlbz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c226cae91f7d43e493b0aaf3af32e7ba/city-transport-simulator-tram-6mlbz.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Become a tram driver, so hop into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience! Take your pick from a selection of three real life trams, the ULF B1, R2.2b, or ULF A1, and hit the city streets of Tramau! Transport your passengers while sticking to a timetable and create your own tram routes to build up a fully functioning and effective tram network.

<!--image-->
![City Transport Simulator: Tram-hjnfg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c226cae91f7d43e493b0aaf3af32e7ba/city-transport-simulator-tram-hjnfg.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Career Mode
<!--text-->
Become an operations manager for the entire tram network in career mode! From humble beginnings and limited resources, start off with a brand new fully customisable tram operation. As you pick up and drop off your passengers on time and carry out other tasks, youâ€™ll earn XP to level up and unlock more operational resources. Use these new resources to expand your tram lines, increase your fleet of vehicles, and work towards building a city-sprawling interconnected tram network.

<!--image-->
![City Transport Simulator: Tram-l8r5o](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c226cae91f7d43e493b0aaf3af32e7ba/city-transport-simulator-tram-l8r5o.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Sandbox Mode
<!--text-->
No expectations, no pressure, just a chill tram drive. Take in the photo realistic graphics and true-to-life tram physics, day or night. Create tramlines with no limitations and transport your passengers how you see fit. Take your trams out for a spin and drive according to timetables: a purely classic tram driving experience.

<!--image-->
![City Transport Simulator: Tram-herze](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/c226cae91f7d43e493b0aaf3af32e7ba/city-transport-simulator-tram-herze.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Welcome to Tramau
<!--text-->
Inspired by cities found in southern Germany, Tramau is a transit-friendly city which blends historical charm with forward innovation. Revel in the fun of creating a bustling, efficient tram network while admiring the city's skyline, punctuated with landmarks including a majestic cathedral that stands as a testament to Tramau's rich cultural heritage.
